          <title>
            <string language="sl">Moj brat - invalid</string>
            <string language="en">My brother - invalid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Bruder - Invalider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon frère - invalide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu irmão - invalid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mio fratello - invalid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αδελφός μου - άκυρος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi hermano - invalid</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Skozi besedilo učenci spoznajo odnos do invalidnega vrstnika.</string>
            <string language="en">Short story that describes social relations between normal and disabled children.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">invalid</string>
            <string language="en">invalid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voziček</string>
            <string language="en">wheelchair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odnosi</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Geschichte, die Sozialrelationen zwischen den
normalen und untauglichen Kindern beschreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire courte qui décrit des relations sociales 
entre les enfants normaux et handicapés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História curta que descreve relações sociais 
entre crianças normais e disabled.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia corta che descrive i rapporti sociali fra i 
bambini normali e disabled.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη ιστορία που περιγράφει τις κοινωνικές σχέσεις
μεταξύ των κανονικών και με ειδικές ανάγκες παιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia corta que describe relaciones sociales 
entre los niños normales y lisiados.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
